dash.title: Theme & Art Camps
dash.desc: Something short and leading about the collection below—its contents, the creator, etc. Make it short and sweet, but not too short so folks don't simply skip over it entirely.

new.name_choosing_title: Pick a name, camp name must be unique though when choosing the system will validate your pick. be patient.
new.header_desc: To create new camp you have to provide us some information, then your new camp will be reviewed by theme camps team leader

join.camp_choosing_title: The list below includes camp that are open for new members. choose one to apply a join request.
